column1: Funeral services for Mrs. Ava Olene Smith Maynard will be held Monday
column3: 2015 at 1 PM from the chapel of the Hall Funeral Home in Livingston with burial to follow in the Fellowship Cemetery in Allons
column4: TN. Family will receive friends at the funeral home on Sunday evening
column6: 2015 starting at 6 PM until 9 PM. Officiating will be Bro. Ricky Lewis.
